text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

description.value: Profile to perform checks specific to the zib2024 package.

human.value: When applying datatype profile zib-AnatomicalLocation, the associated ValueSet should be bound.
When applying datatype profile zib-AnatomicalLocation, the associated ValueSet should have binding strength extensible.
